settings.cover.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL, base64 image, or Chrome extension local image
settings.title: Settings
settings.autoFocusSearchBox: Auto focus search box on page load
settings.animation.desc: Enable animation (white screen on first open)
settings.about.openSourceDesc: This application follows the open source license
settings.about.openSourceDesc2: , the code is fully open. Developers are welcome to contribute, learn, and communicate.
settings.about.termsDesc1: This application is for personal use only for technical learning, programming practice, or academic research. Users are encouraged to read the code, debug modules, and participate in open source community discussions to understand software design and implementation.
settings.about.termsDesc2: It is strictly forbidden to use the code, functions, interface, or derivative content of this application directly or indirectly for any commercial scenario, including but not limited to: releasing as paid software/service after secondary development; integrating into enterprise business systems for commercial benefit; using the content for traffic, advertising, or other profit-making activities.
settings.confirmReset.title: Confirm Reset Settings
settings.confirmReset.desc: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default? This action cannot be undone.
